title: Delete Profile Address response
description: Delete Profile Address response. Response after customer profile address attributes updated.

shippingAddress.description: The default shipping address to updated to null if default shipping address deleted.

contactShippingingAddress.description: The default shipping address to updated to null if default shipping address deleted.

shippingAddresses.description: List of shipping addresses associated with profile.

contactBillingAddress.description: The default billing address to updated to null if default billing address deleted.

123456.shippingAddress: Assigned null if default shipping address deleted
123456.contactShippingAddress: Assigned null if default shipping address deleted
123456.contactBillingAddress: Assigned null if default billing address deleted
